english_example_sentence: If the children eat delicious food, they become very happy.
russian_example_sentence: Если дети едят вкусную еду, они становятся очень счастливыми.
turkish_example_sentence: Çocuklar lezzetli yemek yerlerse, çok mutlu olurlar.
